metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Storybook Love (The Princess Bride) has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Melodic Complexity and Chord-Bass Melody and below-average scores in Chord Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion: Storybook Love (The Princess Bride) has sections analyzed in the following keys: D Major,  and G Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
